Converts an associative array to an attribute string.

attribs(array | \Aura\View\Helper\Traversable $attribs, array $skip) : string

Parameters

$attribs

array\Aura\View\Helper\Traversable

From this array, each key-value pair is converted to an attribute name and value.

$skip

array

Skip attributes listed in this array.

stringThe attribute string.
